nodes.text: Theovor Mindak was a Human male scientist in the employ of the rebellious Sith Lord Grathan on Dromund Kaas. Mindak actively colluded with Grathan and the Eagle's network and oversaw his own lab within Grathan's estate.
Mindak was killed by an Imperial Agent during the Cold War and was survived by his daughter, Samara, whom he considered "worthless".
